backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw backend defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases, user profiles, and OpenAI config with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the 'New Case' button restoration in CasesListView.tsx is implemented with high confidence, referencing REQ-1 test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one- to two-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's React components, hooks, utilities, and types.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, chart colors, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SurgiPaw PWA, setting the app title, favicon, viewport meta tags, PWA manifest link, and mounting the React app at the root div.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, display mode, theme colors, and icon assets in multiple sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first strategy with precaching of app shell assets, runtime caching of static files, and exclusions for authentication and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, view navigation (Dashboard/Cases/Settings), sticky header with logo, and rendering ProfileSetupModal and view components with case highlight/scroll support.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login/logout button component using Internet Identity that clears the React Query cache on logout and handles already-authenticated edge cases.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup that collects a name and saves it via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation, blocking dismissal until submitted.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the checklist items (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) for surgery cases and exports utility functions to get default selections, remaining/completed task counts, and Tailwind color classes.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Renders a collapsible card for a surgery case showing patient info (species icon, name, MRN, sex, age) and checklist task status, with optional edit and task-click callbacks.
A dialog for editing an existing surgery case's fields (patient info, dates, checklist tasks) that submits updates via the useUpdateCase mutation hook.
A dialog for creating a new surgery case with form validation, speech-to-text quick-fill, debounced previous-case search, and checklist task selection, submitting via useCreateCase.
Displays a filterable, searchable, and sortable list of surgery case cards with controls for species, task type, completion status, sort order, CSV import/export, and new case creation.
A search input component with a search icon and a clear button for filtering cases by any field.
A dropdown select control that allows the user to choose a sort option for the cases list using predefined SORT_OPTIONS.
A popover filter component for filtering surgery cases by species (canine, feline, other) with checkboxes, persisting selections to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by task types and completion status, with sessionStorage persistence for filter state.
A checklist UI component that supports two modes—creation (toggling task selection) and completion (toggling task completion)—rendering colored checkbox items from CHECKLIST_ITEMS.
A panel component providing CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, handling parsing errors, progress tracking, and create/update mutations via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY entry with auto-slash insertion and a calendar popover picker, with blur validation and auto-advance on completion.
Utility module for exporting surgery cases to CSV and importing/parsing CSV files back into case data structures, including field validation and matching against existing cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, row type, validation constants for species/sex/boolean values, and a date format regex.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides functions to filter surgery cases by species, by incomplete task types, by all-tasks-completed status, and to exclude fully completed cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: A React hook that wraps the Web Speech Recognition API to provide recording state, transcript accumulation, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors, and removing artifacts; used as a fallback text cleaner.
Parses label:value formatted text lines into a partial CaseFormData object, mapping recognized field labels to typed values including dates, species, and sex.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates and triggers a browser print dialog for a landscape HTML table report of surgery cases with remaining checklist tasks, using a hidden iframe.
Generates and downloads a timestamped CSV report of surgery cases including remaining tasks, using browser Blob and anchor-click download.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides utility functions to format case data (dates, species, sex, text) into human-readable strings for PDF display.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides utility functions to format case data (dates, species, sex) into human-readable strings for CSV/report display, mirroring pdfFormatters.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of SurgeryCase objects by a search query, matching against basic fields and remaining (selected but incomplete) checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file, likely a placeholder for an AI image analysis service.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that sorts SurgeryCase arrays by arrival date or open task count.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines constants for species and sex dropdown options, and the CaseFormData interface used in case creation/editing forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields and date parsing/formatting utilities, including conversion between Date objects and nanosecond bigints.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Renders the main dashboard with active case cards, stats (active cases and open tasks), and controls for searching, filtering by species/tasks, and sorting.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Provides utilities to extract open task items from individual cases and calculate the total open task count across all cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Renders a settings page where users can configure and save an OpenAI API key, with status indicators for whether AI analysis is currently enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the debounced version to reduce rapid updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for all backend actor calls including user profiles, admin checks, OpenAI config, and surgery case CRUD operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light mode colors, including custom variables for patient name, species, complaint, and notes fields.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript ambient module declaration for tesseract.js, defining interfaces for OCR workers, recognition results, and enums for page segmentation and OCR engine modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration mapping OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extending theme with custom fonts, border radii, and enabling animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for SurgiPaw describing pending fix requests to restore the 'New Case' button and CaseFormDialog functionality that were lost during a revert from version 77.
